ValidationRule.description: Prevent a user from changing the status from closed/cancelled .
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE ( Status__c), "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE ( Status__c), "Cancelled") ), ISCHANGED( Status__c), NOT ( $Profile.Name= "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot Change Status after CFR has been Closed and Cancelled.
